title: No awards except upon legal evidence
context: ยง662-13 No awards except upon legal evidence. In no case shall any liability be implied against the State, and no award shall be made against the State except upon such legal evidence as would establish liability against an individual or corporation. [L 1957, c 312, pt of ยง1; Supp, ยง245A-13; HRS ยง662-13]
